name: Rug Rag
tag_list: antique-rugs, oriental-rugs, area-rugs, appraisals, rug-blog, persian-rugs, carpets, information
description: Oriental Rug Antique Rug Hand Knotted
overview: Rug Rag provides the public with important purchasing information for hand knotted Oriental rugs including new, semi-antique and antique rugs from the Far East and Persia. The website offers several interactive tools such as a “style guide” “stain removal guide” automated “rug estimator”an active blog and Oriental Rug and Carpet Forum. Our goal is to provide the consumer with the tools needed to make an educated purchasing decision when shopping for rugs.
